trends: There have been 31 other sightings in Clearwater
There were no other sightings in Clearwater on or around February 4th 2012
divs: sighting detailsmy daughter and her friend and i were walking along clearwater beach, just north of the pier just before midnight on february 4th, 2012 when i turned around to take a picture of them with the pier in the background. i noticed a "reddish-orange flaming ball-shaped" object in the sky to the south of us. at first we thought it might be a plane or helicopter due to the speed, except that it was not blinking, and it changed course, similar to the shape of a question mark, as it headed from east to west from over land to over the water. after we had observed it had gone west enough that it was just past the pier, (as a point of reference) it suddenly shot straight through the clouds and disappeared. living in florida for 12 years and working for delta airlines, i am fairly familiar with the flight patterns of take-off and landings from tampa international airport, and the clearwater\st. pete airport. i do not believe this object followed what i would consider a typical flight pattern due to the change of course, and the speed it used to accelerate into the atmosphere. it was cloudy that night, but not completely overcast, and the object was clearly visible below the clouds until it sped away, never to be seen again. if it was a plane, it would have followed a course in an arc pattern back towards land. it did not seem to have any particular emissions other than the glow of what look like flames that enveloped it. i believe in ufo's and hope this instance isn't my eyes playing tricks on me.
Summary: reddish-orange ball of flames, not blinking, changed direction then shot straight out into the atmosphere.
